		qtbmdescr as string,
		qtbsdescr as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

source(output(
		crcccode as decimal(38,18),
		crccpers2 as decimal(38,18),
		crccpers3 as decimal(38,18),

		crclospro as decimal(38,18),

		crcsdescr as string,
		crcstopuse as string,
		crcsw5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> crctable

		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tcrossreference

		peccofobl as string,
		peccofopt as decimal(38,18),

		peccontyp as string,
		pecdepint as decimal(38,18),
		pecdepity as string,

		pecsw5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> pectable

source(output(
		cbsaddper as decimal(38,18),
		cbsagform as string,
		cbsaowreb as decimal(38,18),
		cbsautocl as decimal(38,18),
		cbsbusnbranch as decimal(38,18),
		cbsbusnsec as decimal(38,18),
		cbscnform as string,
		cbscrewform as string,
		cbsdefcondco as decimal(38,18),
		cbsdefpayer as string,
		cbsdnform as string,
		cbsetcpremium as string,
		cbslang2 as string,
		cbsmdescr as string,
		cbsmutual as string,
		cbspitype as string,
		cbsrefcod as string,
		cbsrenew as decimal(38,18),
		cbsrenewendrule as decimal(38,18),
		cbsrenewperiod as decimal(38,18),

		cbssiidef as string,
		cbsstopuse as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> cbstable2
source(output(
		account_resp_me as string,
		account_resp_pi as string,
		account_status as string,
		client_lost_reason as string,
		company_email as string,
		company_id as double,
		company_name as string,
		company_owner_full_name as string,
		company_owner_id as string,
		country as string,
		cuo_full_name as string,
		cuo_user_id as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		date_updated as timestamp,
		gard_contact_id as string,
		market_area_code as string,
		market_area_description as string,
		market_area_id as string,
		parent_company_id as double,
		parent_company_name as string,
		paris_gic_id as double,
		primary_contact_email as string,
		primary_contact_name as string,
		sf_last_updated_date as timestamp,
		source_system as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SfCompany
pebtable aggregate(groupBy(pebpeaid),
	MAXPEBPEVER = max(pebpever)) ~> maxpeb
Pebselected, maxpeb join(Pebselected@pebpeaid == maxpeb@pebpeaid
	&& pebpever == MAXPEBPEVER,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> pebmaxpeb
qtbtable filter(qtbfieldn=='pebdunco') ~> pebdunco
pebmaxpeb, pebdunco join(pebdunco == toInteger(qtbvalue),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Prtstatusjoin
peatable select(mapColumn(
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Peaselected
Prtstatusjoin select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid = Pebselected@pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever = pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		pebpeaid = maxpeb@pebpeaid,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN = qtbfieldn,
		QTBVALUE = qtbvalue,
		QTBMDESCR = qtbmdescr,
		QTBSDESCR = qtbsdescr,
		QTBDISPYNSW = qtbdispynsw
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Prtstatus
Prtstatus, Peaselected join(pebpeaid == peapeaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> prtpea
crctable select(mapColumn(
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> crcselected
prtpea, crcselected join(pebratcod == crcratcod,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> peacrc
paatable select(mapColumn(
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> paaselected
paaselected filter(iifNull(paafunct,0) ==0) ~> Paafiltered
peacrc, Paafiltered join(peapeaid == paapeaid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> crcpaa
peztable select(mapColumn(
		pezpezid,
		pezdefbusnbranch
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Pezselected
crcpaa, Pezselected join(peapeaid == pezpezid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> paapez
Expression1, state lookup(pebtaxno == SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lookupState
pebtable select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		pebpever,
		pebdunco
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Pebselected
paapez derive(Key = concat('P',toString(peapeaid)),
		{Partner Name} = iifNull(trim(paalongname),iifNull(trim(paacname, peamdescr))),
		Address = concat(trim(paacaddress1),iif(isNull((concat(trim(paacaddress2),concat(trim(paacaddress3), trim(paacaddress4))))),' ',paacaddress2)),
		{Rating Code} = case(isNull(pebratcod),'N/A',pebratcod),
		{Rating Code desc} = case(isNull(crcmdescr),'N/A',crcmdescr),
		{Partner Short Name} = peamdescr,
		Pezdefbusnbranch = toString(pezdefbusnbranch),
		peasubtype = toString(peasubtype),
		{Source System} = 'PARIS',
		{Code Type State} = 368,
		{Code Type Capital} = 116,
		{Code Type Comp Sub} = 795,
		{Code Type Country} = 50) ~> Expression1
lookupState select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch = Expression1@Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		{State Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{State Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, capital lookup(Pezdefbusnbranch == tcrossreference@SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lookupCapital
lookupCapital select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{Capital Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, compsubtype lookup(peasubtype == SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lookupCompSubtype
lookupCompSubtype select(mapColumn(
		pebpebid,
		pebpeaid,
		pebpeoopeaid,
		pebratcod,
		pebratedate,
		pebisolan,
		pebratcomp,
		pebtaxno,
		Pebpever,
		pebdunco,
		MAXPEBPEVER,
		QTBFIELDN,
		QTBVALUE,
		QTBMDESCR,
		QTBSDESCR,
		QTBDISPYNSW,
		peapeaid,
		peamdescr,
		peaccode,
		pealeicode,
		peasubtype,
		peaextid2,
		crcratcod,
		crcmdescr,
		paapeaid,
		paafunct,
		paalongname,
		paacaddress1,
		paacaddress4,
		paacaddress2,
		paacname,
		paacaddress3,
		paactelex,
		pezpezid,
		Key,
		{Partner Name},
		Address,
		{Rating Code},
		{Rating Code desc},
		{Partner Short Name},
		Pezdefbusnbranch,
		{Source System},
		{Code Type State},
		{Code Type Capital},
		{Code Type Comp Sub},
		{Code Type Country},
		{State Code},
		{State Description},
		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Company Sub Code} = TARGET_CODE,
		{Company Sub Description} = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3

cbsttable derive(Key = 'PDIR99',
		{Partner Name} = 'Direct Placed',
		Address = 'Not Applicable',
		pebdunco = toDecimal(null()),
		Duncodesc = 'Not Applicable',
		Address1 = 'Not Applicable',
		Address2 = 'Not Applicable',
		Address3 = 'Not Applicable',
		Address4 = 'Not Applicable',
		{Rating Company} = 'Not Applicable',
		{Rating Code} = 'N/A',
		{Rating Code Description} = 'Not Applicable',
		{Rating Date} = toTimestamp(case(1!=1,1)),
		{Domicile Code} = 'N/A',
		{Domicile Description} = 'Not Applicable',
		Peacode = toDecimal(null()),
		{Capital Code} = toString(null()),
		{Capital Description} = toString(null()),
		{Company Sub code} = toString(null()),
		{Company Sub Desc} = toString(null()),
		State = 'N/A',
		Peaextid2 = toString(null()),
		{Contract Type} = toString(null())) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(

		pebdunco,

		Address2,

		{Domicile Description},

		{Capital Code},
		{Capital Description},
		{Company Sub code},
		{Company Sub Description} = {Company Sub Desc},
		State,
		Peaextid2,
		{Contract Type}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ConstantBroker
cbstable2 derive({Partner Name} = 'Facultativ',

DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(

		State,
		{Contract Type},

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> contract
partner, ConstantBroker, contract union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(Key = key),
	each(match(name!='key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
